description: a(n) = square excess of n-th prime.
mathematica: lst={};Do[p=Prime[n];s=p^(1/2);f=Floor[s];a=f^2;d=p-a;AppendTo[lst,d],{n,6!}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Mar 11 2009 *)#-Floor[Sqrt[#]]^2&/@Prime[Range[90]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jul 06 2014 *)
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Jul 05 2000
